summary: A young Air Force lieutenant falls in love with fighter planes while his father, a Congressman and war hero, yearns for him to fly heavy bombers.
cast: Robert Dornan|Richard Jordahl|Shirley Olmstead|Richard Masters|Steve Early|Robert Winston|Carl Rogers|Ralph Thomas|Joan Lougee
keywords: fighter plane|aerial refueling|refueling|bad acting|u.s. air force
title: The Starfighters
